name: House of Hell (Standalone)
description: YOU are the hero in House of Hell! Can you escape from the Earl of Drumer's malevolent mansion in Steve Jackson's Fighting Fantasy classic RPG gamebook?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3 Processor: 2 GHz dual core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Hardware Accelerated Graphics with dedicated memory Storage: 350 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Hardware Accelerated Graphics with 1GB memory Storage: 350 MB available space

reviews.review_text: A beautiful adaptation of the classic gamebook. UI and layout is slick and polished, and the story itself is solidly written.   One issue is that this book is really TOUGH; you'll need to go through it many times to find the ideal path through it. I would have liked this to be smoothed out with the computer version. Still a recommended classic!
